channel.title: Strength on Bowen Memorial Methodist Church
channel.description: Recent content in Strength on Bowen Memorial Methodist Church

item.title: 07-March-2025 – On Confidence
item.description: Let us therefore come boldly unto the throne of grace, that we may obtain mercy, and find grace to help in time of need. - (Hebrews 4:16) Prayer is the core of the day. Take prayer out, and the day would collapse. — Amy Carmichael Let’s pray: • Lord, give us the confidence to come closer to the Throne of grace today. • Lord, we completely depend on you during a time of need today.
